title: Stabilising an NGO website with a custom WordPress rebuild
heroTitle: Rebuilding an NGO website to eliminate update issues and improve maintainability
snippet: We redesigned and rebuilt an NGO website using a custom WordPress theme to fix frequent breakages caused by theme and version updates.
challenge: The previous website relied on a default WordPress theme and frequently broke after updates, making content changes risky and time-consuming.
solution: We rebuilt the website using a custom WordPress theme with clean layouts and a stable update process, tailored to the NGO's content needs.
impact: The website became stable, easier to update, and no longer broke during routine WordPress updates.

testimonial.name: NGO Trustee
testimonial.quote: Managing the website is much easier now. Updates no longer break the site, and the design feels more aligned with our work.

title: Custom e-commerce website without login friction

title: AI-powered platform for intent-based conversations
heroTitle: Building an AI-assisted platform for meaningful, mindset-based connections
snippet: We built a product that uses AI-guided questions to help users connect through shared intent and mindset rather than swipes or random chats.
challenge: Most chat platforms prioritize engagement over understanding, leading to shallow or noisy conversations. The challenge was to design a system that encourages intentional interaction without turning AI into a replacement for human connection.
solution: We designed and developed a full-stack web application using Gemini-powered question flows, mindset-based matching, and real-time chat. Users can connect one-on-one or create groups based on shared interests and responses.
impact: The platform enables slower, more intentional conversations and demonstrates responsible AI usage focused on guidance rather than automation.

testimonial.name: Internal Product Team
testimonial.quote: Tipsy helped us explore how AI can support meaningful human conversations without replacing them.
